title: PLEASE HELP

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I've tried literally everything i can think of i even contacted support to no avail.

replies.body: Thanks for the screenshot!  This may be due to a poor connection that's failing to grab updates so it's backtracking or disconnecting altogether.  Go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network and get patched.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Ive tried that already sadly 
Im wired as well so i really don't know what the problem is

If you've already gone over every step of the guide to rule out possibilities, then hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Also grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to attach some logs to your ticket to give the tech team more context.  We'll get back to you!
